parse.name: parse
parse.description: Parses a record field and puts the result into one or more fields as specified in the pattern.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: A field or string expression to parse.

parameters.name: preserveFieldsOnFailure
parameters.description: Determines if field values should be preserved if parsing fails. When used in OpenPipeline, the value is `true`.

parameters.name: parsingPrerequisite
parameters.description: Determines if record should be parsed.
